function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Severe economic losses and decline in tourism due to pandemic measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emergency preparedness in urban areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of non-medical spaces into medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of outbreaks on urban functionality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled data collection and storage leading to privacy and security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High volume of data increasing the risk of data overload and mismanagement.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Segregation of information in the urban realm within independent private corporations and government bodies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Configuration of sensor devices by contracted corporations to be incompatible with those of their competitors.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-usage of data in monitoring internal country travel, leading to inadequate tracking of community dispersals and contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols and networks for urban technology","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management policy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Architects and urban planners not being involved in pandemic planning and response","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of emergency response as an engineering challenge rather than a design challenge","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management protocols for architectural and urban institutions for biological disasters like disease epidemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness and response to pandemics despite the availability of modern technologies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited consideration of bio-risk management in architectural and urban planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols for seamless communication in the healthcare sector","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of pandemic preparedness in urban planning and architecture","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capacity to build emergency facilities and support basic survival needs in least developed/developing economies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale spread of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of medical staff and resources in severe areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of 5g application scenarios","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g-enabled ultrasound may lead to misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatment of patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for contact tracing may lead to privacy and security risks for individuals’ data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of 5g infrastructure without proper guidelines and monitoring may contribute to electromagnetic field exposure and public health concerns.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent large-scale outbreaks of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid variation of some viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of public management in pandemic control","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex social systems leading to lower stability and restrictions on public health measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g technology as a disruptive innovation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High bandwidth and low latency of 5g enable efficient delivery of iot data, increasing the risk of rapid spread of contagious diseases through iot devices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai technology can predict the spread of diseases and assist in finding cures, leading to the potential misuse of ai for bioterrorism or deliberate disease spread.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Telemedicine and digitalized prevention measures may create a false sense of security, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing and other preventive measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission within the built environment due to increased use of iot and interconnected devices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of universal commercialization of 5g technology","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient research on business and social value of 5g","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories related to 5g and covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of 5g’s business and social value in pandemic prevention and control research","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge and protection leading to rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New phenomenon and lack of extant literature","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of virus through close contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown of city and closure of public transport","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict public management and restricted daily life","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scattered outbreaks due to imported cases and goods","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate validation and triangulation of sources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of confirmation bias in data analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of medical images and test reports through 5g network.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tele-treatment technology may lead to potential data security and privacy risks due to the transmission of sensitive medical information over a network.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
